page.title: 13Law and Order.
page.content: Each police force in England and Wales has a number of divisions,which are based on large areas of land or population.These divisions,with a Chief Superintendent in charge,usually control a number of sub-divisions,each under the command of a superintendent or a chief Inspector.A sub division is responsible for the day to day policing of a small area.It will have Inspectors,Sergeants,and Constables. Most will also CID(detectives),traffic wardens,typists and other people to support the officer on patrol.If you were unhealthy before becoming a policeman or woman you would have to start a new life by joining a club to make you healthy this helps you alot. by Jill Morgan
